system:
note description: " EiffelVision tool-bar radio button. implementation interface." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2016-09-27 08:50:48 -0700 (Tue, 27 Sep 2016) $" revision: "$Revision: 99192 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_RADIO_BUTTON_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_i.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_RADIO_BUTTON_I redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_init_select_actionsinit_select_actions, ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_button_imp.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_BUTTON_IMP redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_set_item_parent_impset_item_parent_imp, ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_init_select_actionsinit_select_actions, ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_new_tool_bar_buttonnew_tool_bar_button end
../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xmlEV_RADIO_PEER_IMP redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_widget_objectwidget_object end
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_button_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_new_tool_bar_button../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_new_tool_bar_buttonnew_tool_bar_button: FalsePOINTER -- Create a new gtk tool bar button item. do Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_radio_tool_button_newgtk_radio_tool_button_new (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_nullnull) end
feature -- Status setting
f_enable_select../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_enable_selectenable_select -- Select Current. do if not ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_is_selectedis_selected then {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_toggle_tool_button_set_activegtk_toggle_tool_button_set_active (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget, True) end end
feature -- Status report
f_is_selected../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_is_selectedis_selected: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current selected. do Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_toggle_tool_button_get_activegtk_toggle_tool_button_get_active (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget) end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I, ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xmlEV_GTK_CALLBACK_MARSHAL} -- Implementation
f_init_select_actions../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_init_select_actionsinit_select_actions (a_select_actions: ../interface/ev_notify_action_sequence.xmlEV_NOTIFY_ACTION_SEQUENCE) -- Initialize a_select_actions accordingly to the current widget. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_real_signal_connectreal_signal_connect (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget, "clicked", agent ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_app_implementationApp_implementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_application_imp.xml#f_gtk_marshalgtk_marshal.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_dependent_intermediary_routines.xml#f_toolbar_item_select_actions_intermediarytoolbar_item_select_actions_intermediary (Falseinternal_id), Void) end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_set_item_parent_imp../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_set_item_parent_impset_item_parent_imp (a_container_imp: ../implementation_gtk/ev_item_list_imp.xmlEV_ITEM_LIST_IMP [../interface/ev_item.xmlEV_ITEM]) -- Set ../implementation_gtk/ev_item_imp.xml#f_parent_impparent_imp to a_container_imp. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_item_imp.xml#f_set_item_parent_impPrecursor {../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_button_imp.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_BUTTON_IMP} (a_container_imp) if a_container_imp = Void then {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_radio_tool_button_set_groupgtk_radio_tool_button_set_group (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget, ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_nullnull) end end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_widget_object../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_widget_objectwidget_object (a_list: FalsePOINTER): FalsePOINTER -- Returns c_object relative to a_list data. do Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gslist_struct_datagslist_struct_data (a_list) Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_struct_parentgtk_widget_struct_parent (Result) end
f_radio_group../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_radio_groupradio_group: FalsePOINTER -- Pointer to the GSList used for holding the radio grouping of Current do Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_radio_tool_button_get_groupgtk_radio_tool_button_get_group (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget) end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_tool_bar_radio_button.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_RADIO_BUTTON note option: stable attribute end
